item.description: Hope you can join us for a last minute meetup on Thursday, this week, April 11th at Blue Back Square for a Screening of "The Day I Saw Your Heart", which starts at 8:15, so let's meet in the lobby by 7:45pm.  It a light hearted portrait of a Contemporary Jewish family in Paris, which tackles thorny father-daughter relationships, with ex's, new boyfriends, step-families and modern day romance, a charming yet neurotic Jewish father, a new baby and a mid-life crisis.  You can check it out at the JCC website as well, www.mandelljcc.org. We can get together after for coffee and dessert, maybe at the Cheesecake Factory...Hurry and sign up.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Lobby of Criterion Theater at BlueBack Square
item.name: Jewish Film Festival - Last Minute
